articles.title: Forget The iPhone 16, Apple Has Something Much Better - Forbes
articles.description: The iPhone 16 may be on it's way, but a better iPhone is waiting and it will offer value for money, new hardware, and the power of artificial intelligence.
articles.content: With the launch of Apple Intelligence, Apple is ready to join the world of AI-first smartphones. While the iPhone 16 Pro will be the workhorse, Tim Cook and his team will ensure the iPhone 16 can mat… [+4522 chars]

articles.title: Could geo-engineering help save the planet? - BBC.com
articles.description: If we can’t control rising global temperatures by drastically cutting carbon emissions, could something called geo-engineering be a way to cool the planet?
articles.content:
